comments: She is very, very nice. She is confusing to understand & the class is pretty boring but she is super understanding & gives you the chance to re-submit all of your tests. If you communicate with her she will work with you, even let you take a test late if you cannot make it for some reason.

I took Consumer Behavior (required for my major, otherwise I wouldn\'t have taken it) with Aditi and she was very nice. Her accent is sort of difficult to understand at first, but overall, if you pay attention and attend class, it\'s not bad.

Aditi is a very willing teacher. Overall if you put the effort in, she will reward you. Very understanding teacher, a bit hard to understand at times, but is always willing to repeat. I learned a lot from her consumer behavior class, and she is also a good advisor. Go for it!
I like the way she explains the material. Also, she gives good handouts which are very helpful.
She does not know how to explain what she is trying teaching. The simplest task will take her 3 classes to explain and by the end of it you\'ll wide up more confused then when you started.
SHE IS THE WORST TEACHER. YOU CANT UNDERSTAND A WORD OUT OF HER MOUTH AND SHE IS NOT CLEAR. FOLLOW SYLLABUS!
Good Teacher, goes at a slow pace so you can understand the material. Sometimes a little to slow, tends to repeat alot. Once you are used to her accent it isnt bad. Overall pretty easy
